Articles.Content:
No Space Junk/Debris Challenge

Prepare for grand update!

leaked duna one! guess which update it will, and what it will inlude!

This challenge is multi-challenge, every level is harder.

"every step is clean, it's nice to you and me" . Me.

Hello fella space flighters! I see you are not thowing the Kerbodyne S3-7200 to the trashcan. Well. i guess you are just an newbie (don't get ofended k?). you are building an SSTO ? well thats impressive but seriously. Are you weak? na na na na. GET CREATIVE YOU FLIGHTERS!

so here have it. le challenge.

But before. RULES!

  1. No cheats or anything like this. (debug menu, hyperedit, etc.)
  2. Only KER And any camera mod + visual mod is ok.
  3. NO DIRTY SSTO! cmon i hate em'.
  4. No kraken drives. Lader drives. SA kirrim drives. intake drives and Something other drives.
  5. Docking is acceptable but only apollo styled (thats will be hard cuz of the challenge not to leave debris) and rover docking.
  6. Sub and leave a like on my page ))))))00)0)
  7. Respect Moho and eeloo plz.
  8. drone cores parts, or any other command modules that is on deatachale stage (5 or 4th stage for example) will count as debris.
  9. On apollo styled missions, decoplers that left alone in space doesn't count as a debris (if the decople is by himself)
  10. bring jebediah or bill or valentina (no body needs bob lol)
  11. if the debris deatached and it is turn to steak in atmosphere, it isn't count as a debrie (if no pieces left of it).
  12. every challenge is a challenge, you can't complete  sub orbital and orbital challenges at the same mission
  13. no Making History expansion usage!
  14. no tracking station debrie cleaning
  15. Screenshot of every thing that happen required

challenge number one.

Sub Orbital sanitor!

The goal. : Don't leave any debris While doing the mission in Sub orbital tragectory and back.

 Rules For sanitors juniors.

Heatshields doesn't count as debris if deatached.

that mean if you have a heatshield. it woudn't coudn as a  debris.

Rules For sanitors seniors.

Every part that got deatached count as a debris (even that sandwich that you made for breakfast)

that mean that every part ( like an a heatshield) woud count as a debris.

AWARDS

for sanitor juniors of sub orbital challenge.

for sanitor senior of sub orbital challenge.
CONGRATULATIONS! 
 
challenge number 2
Orbital sanitor!
The goal. : Don't leave any debris While doing the mission in orbital trajectory and back.
Rules For sanitors juniors.
Orbital stage ain't count as a debrie IF used to climb to orbit (not to get down)
that mean stage that you climb to orbit (Terrier stage, poodel stage. etc) doen't count as debrie.
but if thoose stages are for de-orbiting, then they count.
Rules For sanitors senior
Only from 0.625 to 1.25 . no Space debris. Don't keep the heatshield with your craft after
re-entry.
Do i even need to explain this?
AWARDS
for sanitor juniors of orbital challenge.
 
for sanitor senior of orbital challenge.
 
 
CONGRATULATIONS! 
 
BONUS CHALLENGE!
Sattelite sanitor!
Rules For sanitors juniors and senior.
Deliver a sattelite to orbit without any debris leaved on orbital and climb.
(fairings count as debris)
that mean don't leave any debris like fairings (tip. deploy before you on orbit deploy 'em) and any stage will count as debris if it is crashed and survived.

AWARD

For sanitors juniors and senior of the Sattelite challenge.

HAVE A GOOD LUCK
 
challenge number 3
Space station sanitor! (???)
The goal. : Don't leave any debris while building a Space Station.
 
Rules For sanitors juniors
 

Build a space station with at least 2 crafts while both crafts haven't leaved any debris if it isn't a heatshield.

that mean you need to send both space craft screenshots so i (or we) woud see that you haven't cheated.

 

Rules For sanitors senior

Build a space station with at least 5 crafts while all of the space craft haven't leaved any debris.

that mean you need to send both space craft screenshots so i (or we) woud see that you haven't cheated.

 

AWARDS

For sanitors juniors.
For sanitors senior.
CONGRATULATIONS! 
 
 
challenge number 4
 

 

The Mun dust sanitor!

The goal. : go to moon and ___ while don't leave any debrie.

Rules For sanitors juniors
Orbit the Mun and get back without leaving any debris
that mean go to mun orbit and get back without leaving any debris
Rules For sanitors senior
Orbit, Land,  Lifftof and bring your crew back from the Mun without leaving any debris.
that mean go to mun orbit, land , Liftoff and land back on kerbin without leaving any debris
 
AWARDS
For sanitors juniors of the Mun challenge
For sanitors seniors of the Mun challenge
CONGRATULATIONS! 
Now. let's take a step further. we will skip Minmus (lik if u cri every tim) and go to DUNA! boiiiiiiiii!!!!!!! well. let's start!
 
challenge number 5
 
The Duna dust collector sanitor!
(the text in red cuz duna is red)
The goal. : reach duna ___ and get back
Rules For sanitors junior
Go to parabolic of duna and get back without leaving any debris.
that mean go to duna parabolic trajectory (transfer trajectory, gravity manuver trajectory) and get back to kerbin without leaving any debris
 
Rules For sanitors senior
Go to duna orbit . and get back without leaving any debris
that mean Go to duna orbit, stay there until next transfer window (optional) and get back to kerbin without leaving any debris.
Rules For executive sanitors
Go to duna, land ,and get back
that mean Go to duna orbit (optional), back. and get back without leaving any debris
AWARDS
For sanitors juniors of the Duna challenge.
For sanitors senior of the Duna challenge.
For executive sanitors of the Duna challenge.
CONGRATULATIONS! 
 
Ok, i see you are still here? well, umm.. ok i have something for you!
it's not the last challenge but maybe the most complicated for sanitors seniors.
I HATE EVE! IT'S HAVE A BIG GRAVITY PULL AND SUPER DENCE ATMOSPHERE AND PURPLE LANDS.. UHHHH!
but it's the most interesting to send a rover there... Or a Sattelite?NO NO EVEN BETTER!! A CREW + ROVER!!!!!!! YES!!!!!!
Well crew + rover only for seniors and for juniors a sattelite.
 
challenge number 6
Eve cleaner sanitor!
The goal: go to eve orbit and stay there/ land a rover and get the crew back.
Rules For new sanitors
Launch a sattelite and make him burn/ crash on eve surface with out leaving any debris
no need to expain
Rules For sanitors junior
Launch a sattelite to eve orbit and then deorbit it with out leaving any debris
that mean get a sattelite to orbit and don't leave debris.
Rules For sanitors senior
Go to eve orbit (optional) , land a rover and get the crew back
that mean deploy the rover from your mother ship, land on eve and get the crew back to kerbin.
AWARDS
For new sanitors of the Eve challenge.
For sanitors juniors of the Eve challenge.
 
For sanitors seniors of the Eve challenge.
yeah yeah
 
CONGRATULATIONS! 
 
wow. you are strong if you still there. wanna go back for your SSTO huh?
hahaha. well well well, you forgot that no ssto's are able here? thats ok i'm your reminder...
uhhhhh i'm also tired but still!
what do we have here... kerbol... Moho...Joo... wait, jool ... jool 5 o o ok! i got it.
do you guys remember laythe? yeah me neither.
well here laythe finally usefull))))
 
challenge number 7
 
Laythe seequel sanitor!
The goal. : go to laythe orbit and back/send a drone done to laythe and go back.
(overal rules)
yes, you can use ISRU but if you leave a debris on refuling object or near that, that will count as a debris.
Rules For sanitors junior
Go to a parabolic trajectory of Laythe and get your crew back
that mean go to laythe parabolic trajectory. and then bring the crew back home safe, without leaving any debris
Rules For sanitors senior
Go to orbital trajectory of laythe , land a drone on laythe. get the crew back
that mean go to laythe orbital trajectory of laythe, get a drone to the surface of laythe. and get the crew team back home without leaving any debris.

AWARDS

 

For sanitors juniors of the Laythe challenge.
For sanitors senior of Laythe Challenge
 
 
 
 
i'm tired so here a short pre last mission
I'll call it Eeloo Moho transfer
Good luck!
 
 
Eeloo to Moho Transfer
The goal. : do a fly by on eeloo and moho with maximum 0 debris left\land on eeloo\moho with maximum 0 debris left.
(overal rules)
yes, you can use ISRU but if you leave a debris on refuling object or near that, that will count as a debris.
 
Rules For sanitors junior
Do an eeloo and moho fly by and bring the crew back.
that mean do an fly by near eeloo and moho, then bring back the crew.
 
Rules For sanitors senior
 
Do an eeloo and moho fly by and land or on eeloo or on Moho.
 
AWARDS
For sanitors juniors of the Eeloo And Moho challenge.
For sanitors Senior of the Eeloo And Moho challenge.
 
 
 
 
 
 
DANGER: A NEARLY IMPOSIBLE CHALLENGE INCOMING! DO IT AT YOUR OWN RISKS.
 
 
 
G g g guys.... are you shore? asked Jebediah...
If verner aproved it. then yes... - sayed Gene Kerman
Ok guys. good luck - sayed Bob Kerman
Th th th thanks... - sayed valentina...
FOR THE WORD OF CLEANESS AND NOT DYNAMITE! - Sayed a random narator
________________________________________________________________________________
 
 
If your here, congrats... this is the last Challenge. the most hard one...
 
prepare
 
THE
 
KERBOL
 
SYSTEM
CLEANLES!
Aka TKSC
!The KERBOL SYSTEM CLEANES!
THE GOAL.: FLY BY/ORBIT EVERY PLANET AND MOON
(OVERAL RULES)
ISRU IS ENABLE.
NO ION ENGINES.
RULES FOR  SANITOR JUNIOR
FLY BY EVERY PLANET AND MOON AND GET BACK WITH OUT LEAVING ANY DEBRIS
THAT MEAN YOU ARE INSANE 
 
RULES FOR  SANITOR SENIOR
ORBIT EVERY PLANET AND MOON AND GET BACK WITHOUT LEAVING ANY DEBRIS
THAT MEAN MATE ARE YOU OVER-INSANE
 
 
AWARDS (HOW DID YOU GOT 'EM)(IF YOU GOT THE SENIOR ONE, GG)
For sanitor junior
For sanitor SENIOR

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
that isn't the last badge
 
if you complete all of the challenges. you are a sanitor master
 
 
Bravo you are my boys
 
The badge for me))))0)))
 
Thanks! and see ya later!!!
Jeronimo.
creater of the NSJ/D Challenge
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Judges:
@JERONIMO

 

Edited August 5, 2018 by JERONIMO
re check

Looks cool  i’ll Think about the sub orbital one. So... I guess... may I be ONE of the judges pls... if yes, thx, if no, still thx. Btw no ssto’s.  but nvm it is still good) I don’t think that laythe one is possible but isru is enable so...

Looks cool  i’ll Think about the sub orbital one. So... I guess... may I be ONE of the judges pls... if yes, thx, if no, still thx. Btw no ssto’s.  but nvm it is still good) I don’t think that laythe one is possible but isru is enable so...

Hello here. thank you verry much. before i accept the judgement. i need you to see  if you can complete at least Duna dust collector sanito junior. i will accept you maybe. thank you verry much again. be reaady and bye

Can you check if one of these two entries qualifies for the last challenge or at least a few of the easier?

Sadly in both attemps I'm not doing orbits but mannend landings. 

The first entry is a completely reusable career playthroug. Starting in an empty career I'm landing manned on every body without leaving any debris.

 

I don't know if I should really post this again, or if everyone is already annoyed by it  also I don't know if you count this as SSTO or if you mean SSTO spaceplanes?

https://youtu.be/iIuSCWxPZm4

hello, i'm verry glad of it! sadly, it isn't doing like i said, BUT! soon or later, there is WILL BE a new badge that will have the needed conditions! if my grammar is bad, forgive me, i'm israeli, not american or english. any way. wait soonly! just a day or two! i't is gonna be a grand update! by the way, it is gonna look like a rhomb! and YOU will be the first one

so, reusablility is great! that show how creative you can be! does it recoverable? if yes.. well no debris woud count i'll watch till the end and give you the final anwser! so maybe you WILL get a badge! lucky you

from all sanitary of the world, Jeronimo!

if yes well, that woudn't count. but i'll add an SSTO mission soon (it will be a bonus mission)

congrats
